name: send_gift
attributes: # [doc = " ギフト手数料を支払い、NFTを別ユーザーへ送信する処理"]
body: let gift_acc = & mut ctx . accounts . gift_account ;
let fee = ctx . accounts . config . gift_fee ;

let payment_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . user_currency_account . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . fee_vault . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ;
token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , payment_accounts) , fee ,) ? ;
gift_acc . gifts_count = gift_acc . gifts_count . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

let nft_transfer_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . vault_nft_account . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . recipient_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . service_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
token :: transfer (CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , nft_transfer_accounts) , 1 ,) ? ;

fields.name: gift_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ギフト処理を実行するユーザー"]

fields.name: user_currency_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ユーザーの通貨アカウント（手数料支払い元）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: fee_vault
fields.attribute: # [doc = " サービス権限で集約する手数料受取口座"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: vault_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFTを保管するVaultアカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: recipient_nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ギフト先ユーザーのNFT受取用アカウント"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: service_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CPI実行権限を持つサービス権限アカウント"]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ギフト手数料を保持する設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このギフト機能を所有するユーザーのPubkey"]

fields.name: gifts_count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに送信したギフトの回数"]

fields.name: gift_fee
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ギフト1回あたりの手数料（トークン単位）"]
